trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted" /> event of <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="E:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager" /> 事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs> to obtain information about a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application after the deployment and application manifests have been downloaded.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs>可以获取有关的信息[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]后已下载部署和应用程序清单的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> to install a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application programmatically on a client machine.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>安装[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]以编程方式在客户端计算机上应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets the context for the current [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 应用程序的上下文。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ActivationContext" /> object representing the context for the current application.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.ActivationContext" /> 对象，表示当前应用程序的上下文。

trans-unit.source: Gets a description of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.
trans-unit.target: 获取 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 应用程序的说明。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ApplicationIdentity" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.ApplicationIdentity" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application manifest for this deployment.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于此部署的 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 应用程序清单。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> representing the application manifest.
trans-unit.target: 表示应用程序清单的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use this variable to grab any information you need from the application manifest, such as a list of dependencies, trust information, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 此变量可用于获取任何信息，你需要的应用程序清单，如依赖项，列表信任的信息，依次类推。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the structure of this document, see [ClickOnce Application Manifest](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29570cec-4e53-4660-a850-abc4fa150243).
trans-unit.target: 有关此文档的结构的详细信息，请参阅[ClickOnce 应用程序清单](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29570cec-4e53-4660-a850-abc4fa150243)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to examine an application manifest from within a <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted> event handler to determine whether the application requires full trust by default.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何检查应用程序清单中的<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted>事件处理程序来确定应用程序是否默认情况下需要完全信任。

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] deployment manifest for this deployment.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于此部署的 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 部署清单。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> representing the deployment manifest.
trans-unit.target: 表示部署清单的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application is cached.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个指示是否缓存此 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 应用程序的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the application is cached; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果缓存应用程序，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the location of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] error log.
trans-unit.target: 获取 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 错误日志的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the location of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] error log.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 错误日志位置的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.
trans-unit.target: 获取 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 应用程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the product name of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application, as stored in the assembly metadata of the application's main executable file.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 应用程序的产品名称的 <see cref="T:System.String" />，此名称存储在该应用程序的主可执行文件的程序集元数据中。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string identifying the subscription.
trans-unit.target: 获取标识该订阅的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string with information identifying the subscription.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，其中包含标识该订阅的信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets the location of a Web page users can visit to obtain product support for the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.
trans-unit.target: 获取用户可以访问并从中获得 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 应用程序的产品支持的网页位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> containing the value found in the <c>supportUrl</c> attribute of the deployment manifest's <c><description></c> tag.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Uri" />中包含的值找到<c>supportUrl</c>的部署清单属性<c><说明></c>标记。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ClickOnce Deployment Manifest](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8457e615-e3b6-4990-8dcf-11bc590e4e9b).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ClickOnce 部署清单](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8457e615-e3b6-4990-8dcf-11bc590e4e9b)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the version of the update for the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.
trans-unit.target: 获取 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 应用程序的更新版本。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Version" /> representing the version number contained within the downloaded manifest.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示下载的清单中包含的版本号的 <see cref="T:System.Version" />。
